description: [NPPSPY](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1131) creates a network listener using the misspelled label logincontroll recorded to the Registry key HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\NetworkProvider\\Order.(Citation: Huntress NPPSPY 2022)

external_references.description: Dray Agha. (2022, August 16). Cleartext Shenanigans: Gifting User Passwords to Adversaries With NPPSPY. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
